name: Roo.DialogManager
desc:
Provides global access to BasicDialogs that have been created and
support for z-indexing (layering) multiple open dialogs.

methods.name: bringToFront
methods.desc: Brings the specified dialog to the front

params.name: dlg
params.desc: The id of the dialog or a dialog

methods.name: sendToBack
methods.desc: Sends the specified dialog to the back

params.name: dlg
params.desc: The id of the dialog or a dialog

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets a registered dialog by id

params.name: id
params.desc: The id of the dialog or a dialog
